title: Design, synthesis, biological and computational screening of novel pyridine-based thiadiazole derivatives as prospective anti-inflammatory agents
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Naresh Podila, Naveen Kumar Penddinti, Mithun Rudrapal, Gourav Rakshit, Sathish Kumar Konidala, Veera Shakar Pulusu, Richie R. Bhandare, Afzal B. Shaik
